comprehensive_overview: Keras is an open-source neural network library written in Python. It is capable of running on top of TensorFlow, Microsoft Cognitive Toolkit, Theano, or PlaidML. Designed with user-friendliness and modularity as its guiding principles, Keras is known for its ease of use and flexibility, allowing users to experiment with deep neural networks.
core_features:
1. User-friendly API
2. Modular and extensible
3. Supports both convolutional networks and recurrent networks, as well as combinations of the two
4. Runs seamlessly on CPU and GPU
